contentBlocks.title: Vaccinations & Routine Exams Walk-In Hours
contentBlocks.content: We offer walk-in hours for vaccinations and routine exams from 12:00 p.m. to 2:00 p.m., Monday through Saturday—no appointment is needed! Whether your pet needs annual vaccinations, a wellness exam, or a health screening, we welcome you during these convenient times to make preventive care easy and accessible.

contentBlocks.title: Internal Medicine
contentBlocks.content: Our veterinary team provides thorough diagnostic workups and effective management for a wide range of health conditions. From chronic illnesses to sudden concerns, we strive to get your pet healthy and back to their best life.

contentBlocks.title: Surgical Services
contentBlocks.content:
We offer a full suite of surgical options, performed in our modern surgical suite:
  • Spay & Neuter Surgery: Prevent unwanted litters and promote long-term health.
  • Soft-Tissue Surgery: Mass removals, wound repairs, hernia repair, and more.
  • Orthopedic Surgery: For bone and joint injuries or conditions, right here in Aurora.

contentBlocks.title: Dental Care
contentBlocks.content:
Oral health is a key part of your pet's well-being. We provide:
  • Dental Scaling & Polishing: Remove tartar and plaque for healthier teeth and gums.
  • Tooth Extraction: Gentle, effective extractions to address serious dental disease and discomfort.

contentBlocks.title: In-House Diagnostic Services
contentBlocks.content:
A fast and accurate diagnosis means faster relief for your pet. Our in-house capabilities include:
  • Digital Radiography (X-Ray)
  • Diagnostic Ultrasound
  • Urinalysis
  • Bloodwork Analyzers
  • Cytology (microscopic examination of cells)

contentBlocks.title: Parasite Prevention
contentBlocks.content: Protect your dog or cat from fleas, ticks, heartworms, and intestinal parasites with our expertly tailored prevention and treatment plans, specifically designed for your pet and our local area.

contentBlocks.title: End-of-Life Care and Cremation
contentBlocks.content: When the time comes, our compassionate team is here to provide gentle end-of-life care, humane euthanasia, and respectful cremation services to support your family during difficult moments.

contentBlocks.title: Online Pharmacy
contentBlocks.content: For convenient, safe, and affordable prescription refills and pet supplies, enjoy our secure online pharmacy – delivered right to your door.
